USP.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a feature of a product that makes it different from other similar products, and therefore more attractive to people who might buy it
USP.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: abbreviation for UNIQUE SELLING POINT or UNIQUE SELLING PROPOSITION
USP.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: To succeed, a USP is not a luxury, it is a necessity.
